review.reviewBody: I thought New West had the Best chinese food--I was wrong--this is the BEST place in the Lower Mainland!! lots of sprouts in the chow mein--breaded lemon chicken---Unbelievable Great!! Everything was Awesome!!! Well worth trying this food!!!

Fresh food..Will order again.. The food was low on flavors but quantity was good...
They missed instructions about substituting more beef chopsuey over chicken balls, and there were no utensils.
Delivery guy was nice and we gave cash tip to the driver.
Food was delicious and fresh and the portions are huge! Best Chinese place I have ever had!!
Everything was made fresh and so delicious. The chicken balls had a nice crisp coating, generous portions of beef in the beef chop suey, and the rice was perfectly done. Yum!
Lots of good tasting BBQ Pork with my order. The Shanghai noodles were excellent. Hot and sour soup was good. The dumplings were good too. I will reorder from this restaurant. Cheers!
